LightningComponentBundle.description: This component enables to force the navigation or reopening of a record in another page.

property.name: isMainTab
property.label: Main Tab?
property.description: Indicates if the current record should be open in Main or Subtab (in console mode)

property.name: parentField
property.label: Parent Field
property.description: API Name of the lookup field providing the expected Parent ID (if subtab of console mode)

property.name: targetPage
property.label: Target Page
property.description: Page reference to navigate to (with lookup field API Name as recordId if target is a record page)
